channel.title: Bizarre Combat Glitch
channel.description: Base: Project Insanity Revision: 317 The Problem: Can only attack any NPC once, and can't attack after that. Information & Media: The First Attack deals damage. It won't matter if its mage, range or melee. I dont see any animation your character will just stand there and get hit. It Might be defending but you can't see it with some weapons. when you attack a npc, you only attack it once and then after you can't attack it but it will keep attacking you. Having Auto Retaliate on doesn't fix it either. Does anyone know the fix for this?

item.title: Bizarre Combat Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Slader Slader
item.description:
@Slader wrote:

Base: Project Insanity
Revision: 317
The Problem: Can only attack any NPC once, and can’t attack after that.
Information & Media:
The First Attack deals damage. It won’t matter if its mage, range or melee. I dont see any animation your character will just stand there and get hit. It Might be defending but you can’t see it with some weapons.
when you attack a npc, you only attack it once and then after you can’t attack it but it will keep attacking you. Having Auto Retaliate on doesn’t fix it either. Does anyone know the fix for this?

Read full topic
